bike.description: Specialized compact design, SLX tubing, double butted, heat-treated

Body Geometry, thin Bar Phat, black cork ribbon
Shimano Ultegra, STI, flight deck compatible
Mavic Ksyrium Equipe, 20 hole, Mavic QR
Mavic Ksyrium Equipe, 24 hole, sealed freehub, Mavic QR
Specialized Mondo Pro SL, 700 x 23c, 120TPI, aramid bead
Specialized Mondo Pro SL, 700 x 23c, 120TPI, aramid bead
Specialized Turbo Ultra Light, presta valve
Specialized Body Geometry Pro, leather, with tubular Cr-Mo rails
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
